verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>(for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> was the <S%H1060>firstborn;<s%> but, forasmuch as he <S%H2490>defiled<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H3326>bed,<s%> his <S%H1062>birthright<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the genealogy is not to be <S%H3808>reckoned<s%> <S%H3187><s%> after the <S%H1062>birthright.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> above his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H4480>of<s%> him came the chief <S%H5057>ruler;<s%> but the <S%H1062>birthright<s%> was Joseph's: <S%H3130>)<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons,<s%> I say, of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were, <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> and <S%H6396>Pallu,<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> and <S%H3756>Carmi.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel;<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
Micah <S%H4318><s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7211>Reaia<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H1168>Baal<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>

Beerah <S%H880><s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H8407>Tiglath-pileser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> carried <S%H1540>away<s%> captive: <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites.<s%>

And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> when the <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> of their <S%H8435>generations<s%> was reckoned, were the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> <S%H3273>Jeiel,<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%>

And <S%H1106>Bela<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5811>Azaz,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8087>Shema,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo<s%> and Baal-meon: <S%H1186><s%>

And <S%H4217>eastward<s%> he <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the entering <S%H935>in<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> were <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H1905>Hagarites,<s%> who <S%H5307>fell<s%> by their <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their <S%H168>tents<s%> throughout <S%H5921>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H4217>east<s%> land of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> over <S%H5048>against<s%> them, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> Salchah: <S%H5548><s%>
Joel <S%H3100><s%> the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> and <S%H8223>Shapham<s%> the <S%H4932>next,<s%> and <S%H3285>Jaanai,<s%> and <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

And their <S%H251>brethren<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> were, <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> and <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> and <S%H7652>Sheba,<s%> and <S%H3140>Jorai,<s%> and <S%H3275>Jachan,<s%> and <S%H2127>Zia,<s%> and <S%H5677>Heber,<s%> <S%H7651>seven.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H32>Abihail<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2359>Huri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3386>Jaroah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3454>Jeshishai,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3163>Jahdo,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H938>Buz;<s%>
Ahi <S%H277><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5661>Abdiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1476>Guni,<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and in her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of <S%H8289>Sharon,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H8444>borders.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogies<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> valiant <S%H1121>men,<s%> <S%H2428><s%> <S%H376>men<s%> able to <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H4043>buckler<s%> and <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and to <S%H1869>shoot<s%> with <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and <S%H3925>skillful<s%> in <S%H4421>war,<s%> were <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore,<s%> that went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H6635>war.<s%>
And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H1905>Hagarites,<s%> with <S%H3195>Jetur,<s%> and <S%H5305>Nephish,<s%> and <S%H5114>Nodab.<s%>

And they were <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, and the <S%H1905>Hagarites<s%> were <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H7945>with<s%> <S%H5973><s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and he was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> of them; <S%H3588>because<s%> they put their <S%H982>trust<s%> in him.

And they took <S%H7617>away<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle;<s%> of their <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and of <S%H2543>asses<s%> two <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and of <S%H5315>men<s%> <S%H120><s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> there fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H4421>war<s%> was of <S%H4480>God.<s%> <S%H430><s%> And they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their <S%H8478>steads<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1473>captivity.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H7235>increased<s%> from <S%H4480>Bashan<s%> <S%H1316><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H1179>Baalath-hermon<s%> and <S%H8149>Senir,<s%> and unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> even <S%H6081>Epher,<s%> and <S%H3469>Ishi,<s%> and <S%H447>Eliel,<s%> and <S%H5837>Azriel,<s%> and <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> and <S%H1938>Hodaviah,<s%> and <S%H3164>Jahdiel,<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> <S%H8034>famous<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And they <S%H4603>transgressed<s%> against the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and went a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them.

And the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H6322>Pul<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H8407>Tiglath-pileser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and he carried them <S%H1540>away,<s%> even the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them unto <S%H2477>Halah,<s%> and <S%H2249>Habor,<s%> and <S%H2024>Hara,<s%> and to the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H1470>Gozan,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
